page.title: 12A SCHOOLS' CRICKET MATCH
page.content: Limehouse School regularly hosts cricket matches against other schools in this area. There are three different age groups: under-15s, under-14s, and under-13s. Caldew School from Dalston plays annually against Limehouse School. They travel in a small 12 seater mini-bus to Limehouse School.It takes about ten minutes to reach the school. In the 1985 game each team played twenty overs. Limehouse won the toss of the coin and put Caldew into bat first. Caldew's innings owed much to an unbeaten partnership of 75 runs. Caldew's final score after twenty overs was 103 for 4. Limehouse's final score was 39 all out. It was an enjoyable game for both teams and there were no hard feelings at the end.
